pages.text: Though many like to write them off as grotesque, toads are rumored to have healing

properties.$(2br)Not only that, but they are also fabled to have an innate affinity with potions, often assisting witches on their brewing. $(br2)They are also useful when facing the annoying mosquitoes that plague the lovely swamps that choose to live in the lovely swamps that some witches choose to call their abode, so there's that. $(br)$(o)You really shouldn't kiss them.
